section.p:
All who hear the mermaids’ song are drawn to their doom. Your only hope lies in the possibility that you are tone deaf. There is no chance of this if you are a Troubadour;
for any other profession, and on a score of 2 you are tone deaf.

p.if: If you turn out to be tone deaf, .
p.else:
If not, get the codeword Cerumen before
turning to 333 in Into the Underworld.
[You’re out of luck - .]
